title: Chalo Chalo
notes: Steam reviews are Positive (80% of 20). SteamDB shows 69.94% positive (27 reviews); blended score reflects mixed-positive small sample. Steam store lists 20 reviews and confirms 3–8 players on the same screen using controllers.
raw_comment: Really slow racing for 3 to 8 players. Gamepads or phones as controllers. Shared screen.
